kraken.details: The Kraken stirs! To defend your ship, collect 7 separate cannonball drops from bosses and obtain normal, oak, teak, and mahogany planks from boss drops.

galvek.details: Galvek strikes! Each team must post their top 3 fastest KC times. Only the swift will survive.

tempoross.details: A storm brews! Tempoross challenges you to earn the most solo points in a single run. Post your score!
